VariantTask

Source: R/variant.R
VariantTask.Rd

VariantTask

VariantTask

Details

An R6 class that represents a Variant Task

See also

Other R6 classes: Bundle, Content, ContentTask, Environment, PositConnect, Task, Vanity, Variant, VariantSchedule
